text: This is a list of cities and towns in Oklahoma. In Oklahoma, cities are all those incorporated communities which are 1000 or more in population and are incorporated as cities. Towns are limited to town board type of municipal government. Cities may choose among aldermanic, mayoral, council-manager, and home-rule charter types of government. Cities may also petition to incorporate as towns. __TOC__ ==All cities and towns by population== 2020 Rank City 2020 Census 2010 Census % Change County Oklahoma City †† Oklahoma Canadian Cleveland
